column1: #Text=It's racist to think the 15% tax is aimed at the Chinese.
#Text=It's aimed at all those non-Canadian residents but its interesting that one particular group keeps trying to compare it to the head tax, why is that?
#Text=Maybe a Canadian of Chinese heritage wrote the legislation....who knows....so quit the whining.
#Text=I got an idea, let's track RE data better and we can use better facts in our arguments...until then, quit being racist.
